trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of interfaces for use in Web Parts connections.
Communication between a provider and consumer requires a contract defined in an interface.
This collection contains all the communication interfaces supported by the consumer.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint.GetSecondaryInterfaces%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method returns a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionInterfaceCollection> object.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionInterfaceCollection"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionInterfaceCollection"></xref> class with the specified collection.
A collection of objects to convert into a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionInterfaceCollection"></xref>.
An object in connectionInterfaces cannot be added to a collection.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionInterfaceCollection"></xref> class by combining the two specified collections.
A to combine with the connectionInterfaces object.
A collection to combine with the existingConnectionInterfaces object.
An object in connectionInterfaces cannot be added to a collection.
Determines whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionInterfaceCollection"></xref> object contains a specific value.
The type to locate in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionInterfaceCollection"></xref>.
`true` if value is found in the ; otherwise, `false`.

Copies the entire <xref href="System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase"></xref> object to a compatible one-dimensional <xref href="System.Array"></xref>, starting at the specified index of the target array.
The one-dimensional <xref href="System.Array"></xref> that is the destination of the elements copied from <xref href="System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Array"></xref> must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in array at which copying begins.
References a static, read-only instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionInterfaceCollection"></xref> class.

Searches for the specified object and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the entire <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionInterfaceCollection"></xref> collection.
The type to locate in the collection.
The zero-based index of the first occurrence of value within the entire , if found; otherwise, -1.
Gets the element at the specified index.
The zero-based index of the element to get.
The element at the specified index.
